_source.text: Actually, I like Apple and Moses and maybe even Peanut better than Moroccan!! Maybe they'll "wake up" and change the names before it goes too far/long?? (crossing fingers...)

text: Actually, I like Apple and Moses and **maybe** even Peanut **better** **than** Moroccan!! **Maybe** they'll "wake
up" and change the names before it **goes** too far/long?? (crossing fingers...)

_source.text: After all, it's an extra set of eyes that keeps a good lookout and that knows exactly what goes on at an airport, maybe even better than the police.....

text: at an airport, **maybe** even **better** **than** the police.....
After all, it's an extra set of eyes that keeps a good lookout and that knows exactly what **goes** on

_source.text: Actually, I like them almost as good as - or maybe even better than - Harry Potter.The reason being that Harry always has a repeat of the last book - goes to Hogwarts, celebrates Christmas, then is captured by Voldemort and then escapes.

text: Actually, I like them almost as good as - or **maybe** even **better** **than** - Harry Potter.The reason being
that Harry always has a repeat of the last book - **goes** to Hogwarts, celebrates Christmas, then is captured by Voldemort and then escapes.
